bike.description: High Modulus D-6 carbon with aero shaped tubes, Internal cable routing, EST (extended seat tube), Integrated Alloy cupped head tube, Double water bottle mounts.
sizes: XXS (48cm), XS (50cm), S (52cm), M (54cm), L (56cm), XL (58cm), XXL (60cm)
